page-not-found-text: The page you're looking for was not found.

contact-form.success: Thank you. We’ve received your message.
contact-form.error: We seem to have run into a problem.

form.create_password_instructions: Passwords should be at least 6 characters long and should contain a mixture of letters, numbers, and other characters.

auth.continue_w_login_label: This option allows you to safely save your work.
auth.continue_wo_login_label: You can still save your work, but it will get lost if the browser’s cache is erased.
auth.log_in_w_email: Or, log in using your email and password.
auth.logged_in_status_issue: Account status is {{status}}, check your email for more information.

sign_in.error_message: There was an error signing you in.
sign_in.error_message_google: There was an error signing you in with Google.
sign_in.error_message_facebook: There was an error signing you in with Facebook.

set_password.error_message: There was an error updating your password.

reset_password.description: Enter your email to reset your password
reset_password.instructions: Enter your email to reset your password
reset_password.success_message: We’ve sent you a link to with instructions to reset your password
reset_password.error_message: There was an error resetting your password.

activate.success_message: Your account has been activated. Please log in to begin using the site as a registered user.
activate.success_message_educator: Your account has been activated, but it will need to be approved by an administrator before you can access educator content. You will receive an email when you have been approved.
activate.error_message: There was an error activating your account.
activate.missing_params_message: The request cannot be completed. One or more required parameters are missing.

facebook_sso.success_message: Your account has been activated. Please log in to begin using the site as a registered user.
facebook_sso.success_message_educator: Your account has been activated, but it will need to be approved by an administrator before you can access educator content. You will receive an email when you have been approved.
facebook_sso.error_message: There was an error signing you in with Facebook.
facebook_sso.missing_params_message: The request cannot be completed. One or more required parameters are missing.

join.title: Teach and learn real astronomy
join.description: Join to learn how astronomers learn and interact with real astronomy data. Free of charge forever.
join.description_students: Join to learn how astronomers learn and interact with real astronomy data. Free of charge forever.
join.description_educators: Join to access real astronomy data and tools for your class. Free of charge forever.

register.instructions_students: Please provide the following to create a student account
register.instructions_educators: Please provide the following to create an educator account
register.success_message_students: Your account is now created, but activation is pending. You’ll receive an email with instructions to activate your account and enjoy access to real astronomy data and tools. Free of charge forever.
register.success_message_educators: Your account is now created, but activation is pending. You’ll receive an email with instructions to activate your account and enjoy access to real astronomy data and tools. Free of charge forever.
register.error_message: There was an error signing you up.
register.error_email_invalid: Email is not a valid email address.

account.error: There was an error fetching your account information.
account.error_session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log back in.
account.error_delete_failed: There was a problem submitting your deletion request. Reload the page and try again.
account.delete_confirm_description: We are sorry to see you go, but you are always welcome to come back. We’ll be here for you, with free of charge investigations for everybody. <0>Are you sure you want to delete your account?</0>
account.delete_success_header: Your request to delete your account has been accepted
account.delete_success_description: We have received your request. An administrator will delete your account promptly.

restricted.message_approval_pending: This content is not yet available for you since approval is pending. If you wish to speed up this process, please send us an email to <0>webmaster@lsst.org</0>.
restricted.message_restricted: This content is not available to you. If you think this is in error, please send us an email to <0>webmaster@lsst.org</0>.
restricted.message_not_authorized: You must log in to access this page.
restricted.message_deletion_pending: You have requested to delete your account. This process is pending. If you think you are seeing this message in error, please send us an email to <0>webmaster@lsst.org</0>.

save_form.label: Save answers
save_form.success_message_unauth: Your work is saved. Nonetheless, it could get lost if the browser’s cache clears. Log in or create an account to save your work safely.
save_form.refresh_error_message: Your session has expired. Please log back in and try again.
save_form.mutation_error_message: There was an error saving your answers to your account.
save_form.status_error_message: Activate your account to begin saving. Check your inbox for an activation email.

section_break.finish_alt: Animated image displaying the message: 'Congratulations, you finished!'
